name: Claim Diagnosis Code I Diagnosis Present on Admission (POA) Indicator Code
title: Claim Diagnosis Code I Diagnosis Present on Admission (POA) Indicator Code

concept.display: Diagnosis was present at the time of admission (POA)
Diagnosis was not present at the time of admission
Documentation is insufficient to determine if condition was present on admission
Provider is unable to clinically determine whether condition was present on admission
Unreported/not used - exempt from POA reporting - this code is the equivalent code of a blank, however, it was determined that blanks were undesirable when submitting the data
Denotes the end of the POA indicators
Denotes the end of the POA indicators in special data processing situations that may be identified by CMS in the future
